name: Viet Capital Ventures
description:
Established in 2018, Viet Capital Ventures (“VCV”) is a venture capital firm domiciled in Vietnam. Making investments on behalf of Limited Partners and General Partners through VCAM's licensed portfolio management service, VCV works with talented founders in Vietnam, supporting their startups with seed and series-A funding, merchant network, and long-termed growth planning.

VCV's leadership includes Mr. Pho Pham - General Partner, who previously served as Vice President at IDG Ventures Vietnam for over a decade, and Kent Nguyen - Venture Partner in charge of technology, former head of engineering of Grab Vietnam and co-founder of Silicon Straits Saigon.

We focus on companies with experienced founders, with technology application and a solid business model in Vietnam's three big and growing sectors: retail, education, and healthcare.
